title: Front End Developer
description: Build intuitive user interfaces using modern frameworks.
Collaborate with designers to bring visuals to life.

title: Back End Developer
description: Design and implement scalable server-side solutions.
Ensure high performance and security standards.

title: UI/UX Designer

title: Sales Manager

title: SMM Manager
description: Plan and execute campaigns to boost brand awareness and engagement.

Track metrics, generate reports, and optimize campaigns based on data insights.
